SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.2_0: na hi kiṃcidapūrvamatra vācyaṃ na ca saṃgrathanakauśalaṃ mamāsti /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.2_1: ata eva na me parārthacintā svamano vāsayituṃ kṛtaṃ mayedam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.3_0: mama tāvadanena yāti vṛddhiṃ kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ prasādavegaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.4_1: yadi nātra vicintyate hitaṃ punarapyeṣa samāgamaḥ kutaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.5_0: rātrau yathā meghaghanāndhakāre vidyut kṣaṇaṃ darśayati prakāśam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.5_1: buddhānubhāvena tathā kadācil lokasya puṇyeṣu matiḥ kṣaṇaṃ syāt //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.6_0: tasmācchubhaṃ durbalameva nityaṃ balaṃ tu pāpasya mahatsughoram /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.6_1: tajjīyate 'nyena śubhena kena saṃbodhicittaṃ yadi nāma na syāt //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.8_1: bahusaukhyaśatāni bhoktukāmair na vimocyaṃ hi sadaiva bodhicittam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.9_0: bhavacārakabandhano varākaḥ sugatānāṃ suta ucyate kṣaṇena /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.12_0: kadalīva phalaṃ vihāya yāti kṣayamanyat kuśalaṃ hi sarvameva /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.12_1: satataṃ phalati kṣayaṃ na yāti prasavatyeva tu bodhicittavṛkṣaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.30_1: kuto vā tādṛśaṃ mitraṃ puṇyaṃ vā tādṛśaṃ kutaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.34_0: iti sattrapatau jinasya putre kaluṣaṃ sve hṛdaye karoti yaśca /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.34_1: kaluṣodayasaṃkhyayā sa kalpān narakeṣvāvasatīti nātha āha //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.35_0: atha yasya manaḥ prasādameti prasavettasya tato 'dhikaṃ phalam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_1.35_1: mahatā hi balena pāpakaṃ jinaputreṣu śubhaṃ tvayatnataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:3_0: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ bodhicittānuśaṃsāvivaraṇaṃ nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.1_1: saddharmaratnasya ca nirmalasya buddhātmajānāṃ ca guṇodadhīnām //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.2_0: yāvanti puṣpāṇi phalāni caiva bhaiṣajyajātāni ca yāni santi /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.2_1: ratnāni yāvanti ca santi loke jalāni ca svacchamanoramāṇi //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.4_0: devādilokeṣu ca gandhadhūpāḥ kalpadrumā ratnamayāśca vṛkṣāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.5_0: akṛṣṭajātāni ca śasyajātāny anyāni vā pūjyavibhūṣaṇāni /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.7_1: ato mamārthāya parārthacittā gṛhṇantu nāthā idamātmaśaktyā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.8_0: dadāmi cātmānamahaṃ jinebhyaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ ca tadātmajebhyaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.8_1: parigrahaṃ me kurutāgrasattvā yuṣmāsu dāsatvamupaimi bhaktyā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.9_1: pūrvaṃ ca pāpaṃ samatikramāmi nānyacca pāpaṃ prakaromi bhūyaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.11_1: snānaṃ karomyeṣa tathāgatānāṃ tadātmajānāṃ ca sagītivādyam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.12_1: tataḥ suraktāni sudhūpitāni dadāmi tebhyo varacīvarāṇi //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.16_1: bhojyaiśca khādyairvividhaiśca peyais tebhyo nivedyaṃ ca nivedayāmi //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.17_1: gandhopalipteṣu ca kuṭṭimeṣu kirāmi puṣpaprakarān manojñān //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.28_1: yanmayā paśunā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ kāritameva vā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.36_0: apriyā na bhaviṣyanti priyo me na bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.36_1: ahaṃ ca na bhaviṣyāmi sarvaṃ ca na bhaviṣyati //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.40_1: āyasya cāgamo nāsti na mariṣyāmi kiṃ nvaham //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.42_1: puṇyamekaṃ tadā trāṇaṃ mayā tacca na sevitam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.47_1: tadāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi tasmin sthāne mahābhaye //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.51_1: viraumyārtaravaṃ bhītaḥ sa māṃ rakṣatu pāpinam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.53_0: yaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva ca saṃtrastāḥ palāyante caturdiśam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.54_1: śaraṇaṃ yāmi vo bhīto bhayaṃ nāśayata drutam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.56_1: naśyanti yeṣāṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadikṣu na labhyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.59_0: adyaiva maraṇaṃ naiti na yuktā me sukhāsikā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.59_1: avaśyameti sā velā na bhaviṣyāmyahaṃ yadā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.60_0: abhayaṃ kena me dattaṃ niḥsariṣyāmi vā katham /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.60_1: avaśyaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi kasmānme susthitaṃ manaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.62_1: ekākī kvāpi yāsyāmi kiṃ me sarvaiḥ priyāpriyaiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.63_0: iyameva tu me cintā yuktā rātriṃdivaṃ tadā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_2.66_1: na bhadrakamidaṃ nāthā na kartavyaṃ punarmayā //
SA11bsa003_u:6_0: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ pāpadeśanā nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_3.7_0: glānānāmasmi bhaiṣajyaṃ bhaveyaṃ vaidya eva ca /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_3.11_0: sarvatyāgaśca nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇārthi ca me manaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_3.11_1: tyaktavyaṃ cenmayā sarvaṃ varaṃ sattveṣu dīyatām //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_3.12_1: ghnantu nindantu vā nityamākirantu ca pāṃsubhiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_3.13_0: krīḍantu mama kāyena hasantu vilasantu ca /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_3.14_0: kārayantu ca karmāṇi yāni teṣāṃ sukhāvaham /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_3.15_1: teṣāṃ sa eva hetuḥ syānnityaṃ sarvārthasiddhaye //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_3.16_0: abhyākhyāsyanti māṃ ye ca ye cānye 'pyapakāriṇaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_3.17_1: pārepsūnāṃ ca naubhūtaḥ setuḥ saṃkrama eva ca //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_3.23_1: tadvadeva ca tāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣiṣyāmi yathākramam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_3.25_0: adya me saphalaṃ janma sulabdho mānuṣo bhavaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_3.33_0: jagadadya nimantritaṃ mayā sugatatvena sukhena cāntarā /
SA11bsa003_u:9_0: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ bodhicittaparigraho nāma tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.3_1: mayāpi ca yathāśakti tatra kiṃ parilambyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.4_0: yadi caivaṃ pratijñāya sādhayeyaṃ na karmaṇā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.4_1: etāṃ sarvāṃ visaṃvādya kā gatirme bhaviṣyati //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.10_0: ekasyāpi hi sattvasya hitaṃ hatvā hato bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.14_0: adyāpi cettathaiva syāṃ yathaivāhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.23_0: nātaḥ parā vañcanāsti na ca moho 'styataḥ paraḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.23_1: yadīdṛśaṃ kṣaṇaṃ prāpya nābhyastaṃ kuśalaṃ mayā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.24_0: yadi caivaṃ vimṛṣyāmi punaḥ sīdāmi mohitaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.25_0: ciraṃ dhakṣyati me kāyaṃ nārakāgniḥ suduḥsahaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.26_1: jānannapi ca nīye 'haṃ tāneva narakān punaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.27_0: atra me cetanā nāsti mantrairiva vimohitaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.27_1: na jāne kena muhyāmi ko 'trāntarmama tiṣṭhati //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.28_1: na śūrā na ca te prājñāḥ kathaṃ dāsīkṛto 'smi taiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.30_0: sarve devā manuṣyāśca yadi syurmama śatravaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.31_1: kṣaṇāt kṣipanti māṃ tatra balinaḥ kleśaśatravaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.34_1: hṛdaye nivasatsu nirbhayaṃ mama saṃsāraratiḥ kathaṃ bhavet //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.35_1: mativeśmani lobhapañjare yadi tiṣṭhanti kutaḥ sukhaṃ mama //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.36_0: tasmānna tāvadahamatra dhuraṃ kṣipāmi yāvanna śatrava ime nihatāḥ samakṣam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.36_1: svalpe 'pi tāvadapakāriṇi baddharoṣā mānonnatāstamanihatya na yānti nidrām //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.38_1: bhavati mama viṣādadainyamadya vyasanaśatairapi kena hetunā vai //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.39_1: mahārthasiddhyai tu samudyatasya duḥkhāni kasmānmama bādhakāni //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.40_1: śītātapādivyasanaṃ sahante jagaddhitārthaṃ na kathaṃ sahe 'ham //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.44_0: galantvantrāṇi me kāmaṃ śiraḥ patatu nāma me /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.45_0: nirvāsitasyāpi tu nāma śatrordeśāntare sthānaparigrahaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.45_1: yataḥ punaḥ saṃbhṛtaśaktireti na kleśaśatrorgatirīdṛśī tu //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.46_0: kvāsau yāyānmanmanaḥstho nirastaḥ sthitvā yasmin madvadhārthaṃ yateta /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.46_1: nodyogo me kevalaṃ mandabuddheḥ kleśāḥ prajñādṛṣṭisādhyā varākāḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.46_2: na kleśā viṣayeṣu nendriyagaṇe nāpyantarāle sthitā
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_4.46_3: nāto 'nyatra kuha sthitāḥ punaramī mathnanti kṛtsnaṃ jagat /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.1_1: na śikṣā rakṣituṃ śakyā calaṃ cittamarakṣatā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.2_0: adāntā mattamātaṅgā na kurvantīha tāṃ vyathām /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.4_0: vyāghrāḥ siṃhā gajā ṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ sarve ca śatravaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.5_1: cittasyaikasya damanāt sarve dāntā bhavanti ca //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.7_1: taptāyaḥkuṭṭimaṃ kena kuto jātāśca tāḥ striyaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.11_0: matsyādayaḥ kva nīyantāṃ mārayeyaṃ yato na tān /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.14_0: bāhyā bhāvā mayā tadvacchakyā vārayituṃ na hi /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.17_0: duḥkhaṃ hantuṃ sukhaṃ prāptuṃ te bhramanti mudhāmbare /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.18_1: cittarakṣāvrataṃ mukttvā bahubhiḥ kiṃ mama vrataiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.22_0: lābhā naśyantu me kāmaṃ satkāraḥ kāyajīvitam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.22_1: naśyatvanyacca kuśalaṃ mā tu cittaṃ kadācana //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.23_1: smṛtiṃ ca saṃprajanyaṃ ca sarvayatnena rakṣata //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.24_1: tathābhyāṃ vikalaṃ cittaṃ na kṣamaṃ sarvakarmasu //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.33_0: saṃprajanyaṃ tadāyāti na ca yātyāgataṃ punaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.39_1: kathaṃ kāyaḥ sthita iti draṣṭavyaṃ punarantarā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.41_0: kutra me vartata iti pratyavekṣyaṃ tathā manaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.44_0: evaṃ hi sukṛtaṃ sarvamanyathā nobhayaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.48_1: na kartavyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavattadā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.49_1: sotprāsātiśayaṃ vakraṃ vañcakaṃ ca mano bhavet //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.61_0: na svīkaroṣi he mūḍha kāṣṭhaputtalakaṃ śucim /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.64_0: evamanviṣya yatnena na dṛṣṭaṃ sāramatra te /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.65_0: na khāditavyamaśuci tvayā peyaṃ na śoṇitam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.67_1: kāyaṃ dāsyati gṛdhrebhyastadā tvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyasi //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.68_0: na sthāsyatīti bhṛtyāya na vastrādi pradīyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.68_1: kāyo yāsyati khāditvā kasmāttvaṃ kuruṣe vyayam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.69_1: na hi vaitanikopāttaṃ sarvaṃ tasmai pradīyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.77_0: sarvārambhā hi tuṣṭyarthāḥ sā vittairapi durlabhā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.78_0: na cātra me vyayaḥ kaścitparatra ca mahatsukham /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.88_0: dharmaṃ nirgaurave svasthe na śiroveṣṭite vadet /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.91_1: neṣṭaṃ jale sthale bhogye mūtrādeścāpi garhitam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.93_1: lokāprasādakaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca varjayet //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.98_0: rātriṃdivaṃ ca triskandhaṃ triṣkālaṃ ca pravartayet /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.99_0: yā avasthāḥ prapadyeta svayaṃ paravaśo 'pi vā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.99_1: tāsvavasthāsu yāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣettā eva yatnataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.100_0: na hi tadvidyate kiṃcidyanna śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.100_1: na tadasti na yatpuṇyamevaṃ viharataḥ sataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.102_0: sadā kalyāṇamitraṃ ca jīvitārthe 'pi na tyajet /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.107_0: yato nivāryate yatra yadeva ca niyujyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_5.109_0: kāyenaiva paṭhiṣyāmi vākpāṭhena tu kiṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:15_0: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ saṃprajanyarakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.2_0: na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.3_0: manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukhamaśnute /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.3_1: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti dveṣaśalye hṛdi sthite //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.6_1: yaḥ krodhaṃ hanti nirbandhāt sa sukhīha paratra ca //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.7_1: daurmanasyāśanaṃ prāpya dveṣo dṛpto nihanti mām //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.10_1: atha nāsti pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.19_0: duḥkhe 'pi naiva cittasya prasādaṃ kṣobhayed budhaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.19_1: saṃgrāmo hi saha kleśairyuddhe ca sulabhā vyathā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.20_1: te te vijayinaḥ śūrāḥ śeṣāstu mṛtamārakāḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.24_0: kupyāmīti na saṃcintya kupyati svecchayā janaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.24_1: utpatsya ityabhipretya krodha utpadyate na ca //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.25_1: sarvaṃ tatpratyayabalāt svatantraṃ tu na vidyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.28_0: anutpannaṃ hi tannāsti ka icchedbhavituṃ tadā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.30_0: yaḥ pūrvavat kriyākāle kriyāyāstena kiṃ kṛtam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.31_0: evaṃ paravaśaṃ sarvaṃ yadvaśaṃ so 'pi cāvaśaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.32_0: vāraṇāpi na yuktaivaṃ kaḥ kiṃ vārayatīti cet /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.33_1: īdṛśāḥ pratyayā asyetyevaṃ matvā sukhī bhavet //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.34_0: yadi tu svecchayā siddhiḥ sarveṣāmeva dehinām /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.38_1: na kevalaṃ dayā nāsti krodha utpadyate katham //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.39_1: teṣu kopo na yukto me yathāgnau dahanātmake //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.41_0: mukhyaṃ daṇḍādikaṃ hitvā prerake yadi kupyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.41_1: dveṣeṇa preritaḥ so 'pi dveṣe dveṣo 'stu me varam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.43_0: tacchastraṃ mama kāyaśca dvayaṃ duḥkhasya kāraṇam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.43_1: tena śastraṃ mayā kāyo gṛhītaḥ kutra kupyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.44_1: tṛṣṇāndhena mayā tatra vyathāyāṃ kutra kupyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.48_0: etānāśritya me pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamato bahu /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.51_0: atha pratyapakārī syāṃ tathāpyete na rakṣitāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.53_1: kāyaṃ na bādhate tena cetaḥ kasmātprakupyasi //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.54_0: mayyaprasādo yo 'nyeṣāṃ sa māṃ kiṃ bhakṣayiṣyati /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.55_1: naṅkṣyatīhaiva me lābhaḥ pāpaṃ tu sthāsyati dhruvam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.57_0: svapne varṣaśataṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yaśca vibudhyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.59_0: labdhvāpi ca bahūṃllābhān ciraṃ bhuktvā sukhānyapi /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.60_0: pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca lābhājjīvan karomi cet /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.60_1: puṇyakṣayaśca pāpaṃ ca lābhārthaṃ krudhyato nanu //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.64_1: na yujyate mama dveṣo buddhādīnāṃ na hi vyathā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.66_1: sā vyathā cetane dṛṣṭā kṣamasvaināṃ vyathāmataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.67_1: brūmaḥ kameṣu nirdoṣaṃ kaṃ vā brūmo 'parādhinam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.68_0: kasmādevaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yenaivaṃ bādhyase paraiḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.69_0: evaṃ buddhvā tu puṇyeṣu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.74_1: kārito 'smi na cātmārthaḥ parārtho vā kṛto mayā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.75_0: na cedaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthaṃ ca kariṣyati /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.76_1: manastvamapi taṃ stutvā kasmādevaṃ na hṛṣyasi //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.77_0: idaṃ ca te hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ sukhodayam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.78_0: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.82_0: puṣṇāti yastvayā poṣyaṃ tubhyameva dadāti saḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.86_0: na kevalaṃ tvamātmānaṃ kṛtapāpaṃ na śocasi /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.84_0: yadi tena na tallabdhaṃ sthitaṃ dānapatergṛhe /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.84_1: sarvathāpi na tatte 'sti dattādattena tena kim //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.85_1: labhamāno na gṛhṇātu vada kena na kupyasi //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.88_0: atha tvadicchayā siddhaṃ tadduḥkhe kiṃ sukhaṃ tava /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.90_0: stutiryaśo 'tha satkāro na puṇyāya na cāyuṣe /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.90_1: na balārthaṃ na cārogye na ca kāyasukhāya me //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.92_1: kimakṣarāṇi bhakṣyāṇi mṛte kasya ca tatsukham //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.95_0: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.95_1: tasyaiva tatprītisukhaṃ bhāgo nālpo 'pi me tataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.98_1: guṇavatsu ca mātsaryaṃ saṃpatkopaṃ ca kurvate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.100_1: ye mocayanti māṃ bandhāddveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.104_0: yo hi yena vinā nāsti yasmiṃśca sati vidyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.104_1: sa eva kāraṇaṃ tasya sa kathaṃ vighna ucyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.105_1: na ca pravrājake prāpte pravrajyāvighna ucyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.109_0: kṣamāsiddhyāśayo nāsya tena pūjyo na cedariḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.113_1: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.114_0: āśayasya ca māhātmyaṃ na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.114_1: samaṃ ca tena māhātmyaṃ sattvānāṃ tena te samāḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.117_1: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.120_0: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśantyavīciṃ yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.121_0: svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yadarthamātmanyapi nirvyapekṣāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.121_1: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.122_0: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.123_0: ādīptakāyasya yathā samantān na sarvakāmairapi saumanasyam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.125_1: kurvantu me mūrghni padaṃ janaughā vighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.126_0: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagattaiḥ / kṛpātmabhirnaiva hi saṃśayo 'sti /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.126_1: dṛśyanta ete nanu sattvarūpās ta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro 'tra //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_6.129_0: yasmānnaiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balam /
SA11bsa003_u:18_0: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.1_0: evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīrye bodhiryataḥ sthitā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.1_1: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vināgatiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.6_1: kathaṃ te rocate bhoktuṃ kathaṃ nidrā kathaṃ ratiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.12_1: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.14_1: mūḍha kālo na nidrāyā iyaṃ naurdurlabhā punaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.19_0: kimutāhaṃ naro jātyā śakto jñātuṃ hitāhitam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.22_0: idaṃ tu me parimitaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃbodhisādhanam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.26_1: māṃsāsthi tyajatastasya tadā kiṃ nāma duṣkaram //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.28_0: puṇyena kāyaḥ sukhitaḥ pāṇḍityena manaḥ sukhi /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.28_1: tiṣṭhan parārthaṃ saṃsāre kṛpāluḥ kena khidyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.37_1: na kṛtā śāsane kārā daridrāśā na pūritā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.38_0: bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattamārtā na sukhinaḥ kṛtāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.40_0: kuśalānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ chandaṃ mūlaṃ munirjagau /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.47_1: anārambho varaṃ nāma na tvārabhya nivartanam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.48_1: anyacca kāryakālaṃ ca hīnaṃ tacca na sādhitam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.51_0: nīcaṃ karma karotyanyaḥ kathaṃ mayyapi tiṣṭhati /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.55_0: mayā hi sarvaṃ jetavyamahaṃ jeyo na kenacit /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.56_0: ye sattvā mānavijitā varakāste na māninaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.58_1: te 'pi cenmānināṃ madhye dīnāstu vada kīdṛśāḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.59_0: te mānino vijayinaśca ta eva śūrā ye mānaśatruvijayāya vahanti mānam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.59_1: ye taṃ sphurantamapi mānaripuṃ nihatya kāmaṃ jane jayaphalaṃ pratipādayanti //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.61_0: mahatsvapi hi kṛcchreṣu na rasaṃ cakṣurīkṣate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.61_1: evaṃ kṛcchramapi prāpya na kleśavaśago bhavet //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.63_0: sukhārthaṃ kriyate karma tathāpi syānna vā sukham /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.63_1: karmaiva tu sukhaṃ yasya niṣkarmā sa sukhī katham //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_7.72_1: kathaṃ karomi yenedaṃ punarme na bhavediti //
SA11bsa003_u:21_0: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ vīryapāramitā nāma saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.3_0: snehānna tyajyate loko lābhādiṣu ca tṛṣṇayā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.4_1: śamathaḥ prathamaṃ gaveṣaṇīyaḥ sa ca loke nirapekṣayābhiratyā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.5_1: yena janmasahasrāṇi draṣṭavyo na punaḥ priyaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.6_0: apaśyannaratiṃ yāti samādhau na ca tiṣṭhati /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.6_1: na ca tṛpyati dṛṣṭvāpi pūrvavadbādhyate tṛṣā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.11_0: hitamuktāḥ prakupyanti vārayanti ca māṃ hitāt /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.11_1: atha na śrūyate teṣāṃ kupitā yānti durgatim //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.18_0: yatra yatra ratiṃ yāti manaḥ sukhavimohitam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.20_1: saha lābhayaśobhiste na jñātāḥ kva gatā iti //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.26_1: kadā taiḥ sukhasaṃvāsaiḥ saha vāso bhavenmama //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.31_0: ayameva hi kāyo me evaṃ pūtirbhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.33_0: eka utpadyate janturmriyate caika eva hi /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.36_1: purvameva mṛto loke mriyamāṇo na śocati //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.40_0: kāmā hyanarthajanakā iha loke paratra ca /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.41_1: na ca pāpamakīrtirvā yadarthaṃ gaṇitā purā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.43_1: prakāmaṃ saṃpariṣvajya kiṃ na gacchasi nirvṛtim //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.46_1: tadadya bhakṣitaṃ yāvat kimīrṣyālo na rakṣasi //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.55_0: yadicchasi na taccittaṃ draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ ca śakyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.55_1: yacca śakyaṃ na tadvetti kiṃ tadāliṅgase mudhā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.59_0: yadi te nāśucau rāgaḥ kasmādāliṅgase param /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.70_0: kaṅkālān katiciddṛṣṭvā śmaśāne kila te ghṛṇā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.72_1: yātyarjanena tāruṇyaṃ vṛddhaḥ kāmaiḥ karoti kim //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.73_1: gṛhamāgatya sāyāhne śerate sma mṛtā iva //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.84_0: na śastraṃ na viṣaṃ nāgnirna prapāto na vairiṇaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.87_0: vihṛtya yatra kvacidiṣṭakālaṃ śūnyālaye vṛkṣatale guhāsu /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.95_0: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca tulyameva sukhaṃ priyam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.96_0: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca na priyam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.96_1: tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yattaṃ rakṣāmi netaram //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.97_0: tadduḥkhena na me bādhetyato yadi na rakṣyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.98_1: anya eva mṛto yasmādanya eva prajāyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.99_0: yadi tasyaiva yadduḥkhaṃ rakṣyaṃ tasyaiva tanmatam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.101_1: yasya duḥkhaṃ sa nāstyasmātkasya tatsvaṃ bhaviṣyati //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.106_1: ātmaduḥkhaṃ na nihataṃ bahūnāṃ duḥkhināṃ vyayāt //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.109_0: ataḥ parārthaṃ kṛtvāpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.112_1: paratvaṃ tu svakāyasya sthitameva na duṣkaram //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.116_0: evaṃ parārthaṃ kṛtvāpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.116_1: ātmānaṃ bhojayitvaiva phalāśā na ca jāyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.125_0: yadi dāsyāmi kiṃ bhokṣye ityātmārthe piśācatā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.125_1: yadi bhokṣye kiṃ dadāmīti parārthe devarājatā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.129_0: ye kecidduḥkhitā loke sarve te svasukhecchayā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.131_0: na nāma sādhyaṃ buddhatvaṃ saṃsāre 'pi kutaḥ sukham /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.132_0: āstāṃ tāvatparo loke dṛṣṭo 'pyartho na sidhyati /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.134_0: upadravā ye ca bhavanti loke yāvanti duḥkhāni bhayāni caiva /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.140_1: bhāvayerṣyāṃ ca mānaṃ ca nirvikalpena cetasā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.141_0: eṣa satkriyate nāhaṃ lābhī nāhamayaṃ yathā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.142_0: ahaṃ karomi karmāṇi tiṣṭhatyeṣa tu susthitaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.142_1: ayaṃ kila mahāṃlloke nīco 'haṃ kila nirguṇaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.143_1: santi te yeṣvahaṃ nīcaḥ santi te yeṣvahaṃ varaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.148_0: api sarvatra me loke bhaveyuḥ prakaṭā guṇāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.148_1: api nāma guṇā ye 'sya na śroṣyantyapi kecana //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.149_0: chādyerannapi me doṣāḥ syānme pūjāsya no bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.149_1: sulabdhā adya me lābhāḥ pūjito 'hamayaṃ na tu //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.151_0: asyāpi hi varākasya spardhā kila mayā saha /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.151_1: kimasya śrutametāvat prajñā rūpaṃ kulaṃ dhanam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.157_0: abhaviṣyadidaṃ karma kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yadi tvayā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.167_0: evaṃ kuruṣva tiṣṭhaivaṃ na kartavyamidaṃ tvayā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.169_0: kva yāsyasi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sarvadarpānnihanmi te /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.170_0: adyāpyasti mama svārtha ityāśāṃ tyaja sāṃpratam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.171_0: tvāṃ sattveṣu na dāsyāmi yadi nāma pramodataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.171_1: tvaṃ māṃ narakapāleṣu pradāsyasi na saṃśayaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.179_0: kiṃ mamānena yantreṇa jīvinā vā mṛtena vā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.179_1: loṣṭādeḥ ko viśeṣo 'sya hāhaṃkāraṃ na naśyasi //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.181_1: na ca sneho na ca dveṣastatra snehaṃ karomi kim //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.182_0: roṣo yasya khalīkārāttoṣo yasya ca pūjayā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.182_1: sa eva cenna jānāti śramaḥ kasya kṛtena me //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.183_0: imaṃ ye kāyamicchanti te 'pi me suhṛdaḥ kila /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_8.183_1: sarve svakāyamicchanti te 'pi kasmānna me priyāḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.1_0: imaṃ parikaraṃ sarvaṃ prajñārthaṃ hi munirjagau /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.3_0: tatra loko dvidhā dṛṣṭo yogī prākṛtakastathā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.5_0: lokena bhāvā dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.9_1: yadi māyopamaḥ sattvaḥ kiṃ punarjāyate mṛtaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.15_0: pratyayānāṃ tu vicchedāt saṃvṛtyāpi na saṃbhavaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.16_0: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.17_0: cittameva yadā māyā tadā kiṃ kena dṛśyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.17_1: uktaṃ ca lokanāthena cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.22_0: dīpaḥ prakāśata iti jñātvā jñānena kathyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.22_1: buddhiḥ prakāśata iti jñātvedaṃ kena kathyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.23_0: prakāśā vāprakāśā vā yadā dṛṣṭā na kenacit /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.26_0: yathā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ jñātaṃ naiveha pratiṣidhyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.27_1: vastu cetsā kathaṃ nānyānanyā cennāsti vastutaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.28_0: asatyapi yathā māyā dṛśyā draṣṭṛ tathā manaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.30_0: grāhyamuktaṃ yadā cittaṃ tadā sarve tathāgatāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.30_1: evaṃ ca ko guṇo labdhaścittamātre 'pi kalpite //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.34_0: yadā na labhyate bhāvo yo nāstīti prakalpyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.35_0: yadā na bhāvo nābhāvo mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.39_0: acittake kṛtā pūjā kathaṃ phalavatī bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.40_0: āgamācca phalaṃ tatra saṃvṛtyā tattvato 'pi vā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.40_1: satyabuddhe kṛtā pūjā saphaleti kathaṃ yathā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.43_0: yatpratyayā ca tatrāsthā mahāyāne 'pi tāṃ kuru /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.46_1: dṛṣṭaṃ ca teṣu sāmarthyaṃ niṣkleśasyāpi karmaṇaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.48_1: sālambanena cittena sthātavyaṃ yatra tatra vā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.50_1: mahāyānaṃ bhavatsūtraiḥ prāyastulyaṃ na kiṃ matam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.51_1: ekena sūtratulyena kiṃ na sarvaṃ jinoditam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.55_1: śīghraṃ sarvajñatākāmo na bhāvayati tāṃ katham //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.56_1: śūnyatā duḥkhaśamanī tataḥ kiṃ jāyate bhayam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.57_0: yatastato vāstu bhayaṃ yadyahaṃ nāma kiṃcana /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.58_1: na siṃghāṇaṃ na ca śleṣmā na pūyaṃ lasikāpi vā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.59_0: nāhaṃ vasā na ca svedo na medo 'strāṇi nāpyaham /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.60_0: nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na ca snāyu noṣmā vāyurahaṃ na ca /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.60_1: na ca cchidrāṇyahaṃ nāpi ṣaḍ vijñānāni sarvathā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.61_0: śabdajñānaṃ yadi tadā śabdo gṛhyeta sarvadā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.61_1: jñeyaṃ vinā tu kiṃ vetti yena jñānaṃ nirucyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.62_0: ajānānaṃ yadi jñānaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.63_0: tadeva rūpaṃ jānāti tadā kiṃ na śṛṇotyapi /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.64_1: ekaḥ pitā ca putraśca kalpyate na tu tattvataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.65_0: sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpi na putro na pitā yataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.71_1: karma kṛtvā vinaṣṭe hi phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.74_0: atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ taddhi na vidyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.76_0: yadi sattvo na vidyeta kasyopari kṛpeti cet /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.77_0: kāryaṃ kasya na cetsattvaḥ satyamīhā tu mohataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.79_0: kāyo na pādau na jaṅghā norū kāyaḥ kaṭirna ca /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.79_1: nodaraṃ nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ noro bāhū na cāpi saḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.80_0: na hastau nāpyayaṃ pārśvau na kakṣau nāṃsalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.80_1: na grīvā na śiraḥ kāyaḥ kāyo 'tra kataraḥ punaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.81_1: aṃśā aṃśeṣu vartante sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.83_0: naivāntarna bahiḥ kāyaḥ kathaṃ kāyaḥ karādiṣu /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.83_1: karādibhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nāsti kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.88_0: evaṃ svapnopame rūpe ko rajyeta vicārakaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.88_1: kāyaścaivaṃ yadā nāsti tadā kā strī pumāṃśca kaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.89_0: yadyasti duḥkhaṃ tattvena prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na bādhate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.89_1: śokādyārtāya mṛṣṭādi sukhaṃ cetkiṃ na rocate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.91_0: asti sūkṣmatayā duḥkhaṃ sthaulyaṃ tasya hṛtaṃ nanu /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.96_1: saṃsarge ca niraṃśatvaṃ yadi dṛṣṭaṃ nidarśaya //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.99_0: yadā na vedakaḥ kaścidvedanā ca na vidyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.99_1: tadāvasthāmimāṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.102_0: na cāsti vedakaḥ kaścidvedanāto na tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.103_0: nendriyeṣu na rūpādau nāntarāle manaḥ sthitam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.104_0: yanna kāye na cānyatra na miśraṃ na pṛthak kvacit /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.106_0: atha jñeyādbhavet paścāt tadā jñānaṃ kuto bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.108_1: sa paścānniyataḥ so 'sti na cennāstyeva saṃvṛtiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.112_1: yadi jñeyavaśādartho jñānāstitve tu kā gatiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.113_0: atha jñeyavaśājjñānaṃ jñeyāstitve tu kā gatiḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.114_0: pitā cenna vinā putrātkutaḥ putrasya saṃbhavaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.115_1: jñeyājjñānena jātena tatsattā kiṃ na gamyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.116_1: jñānāstitvaṃ kuto jñātaṃ jñeyaṃ yattena gamyate //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.120_0: api tvaneke 'nityāśca niśceṣṭā na ca devatāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.122_0: tena kiṃ sraṣṭumiṣṭaṃ ca ātmā cet nanvasau dhruvaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.123_0: karmaṇaḥ sukhaduḥkhe ca vada kiṃ tena nirmitam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.124_0: kasmātsadā na kurute na hi so 'nyamapekṣate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.129_1: evaṃ guṇā na vidyante pratyekaṃ te 'pi hi tridhā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.131_1: sukhādyeva ca te hetuḥ na ca tasmātpaṭādayaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.133_0: satyāmeva sukhavyaktau saṃvittiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.133_1: tadeva sūkṣmatāṃ yāti sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca tatkatham //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.136_1: annādo 'medhyabhakṣaḥ syāt phalaṃ hetau yadi sthitam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.140_1: tasmādbhāvo mṛṣā yo hi tasyābhāvaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛṣā //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.141_0: tasmātsvapne sute naṣṭe sa nāstīti vikalpanā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.143_0: anyato nāpi cāyātaṃ na tiṣṭhati na gacchati /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.143_1: māyātaḥ ko viśeṣo 'sya yanmūḍhaiḥ satyataḥ kṛtam //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.144_1: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirūpyatām //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.147_1: tadavastha kathaṃ bhāvaḥ ko vānyo bhāvatāṃ gataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.150_0: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti sarvadā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.152_0: evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.152_1: satkṛtaḥ paribhūto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.153_0: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.153_1: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā mṛgyamāṇā svabhāvataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.154_0: vicāre jīvalokaḥ kaḥ ko nāmātra mariṣyati /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_9.154_1: ko bhaviṣyati ko bhūtaḥ ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.8_0: so 'ṅgārarāśirmaṇirāśirastu taptā ca bhūḥ sphāṭikakuṭṭimaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.9_1: tacchastrayuddhaṃ ca paraspareṇa krīḍārthamadyāstu ca puṣpayuddham //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.10_1: mama kuśalabalena prāptadivyātmabhāvāḥ saha suravanitābhiḥ santu mandākinīsthāḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.10_2: trastāḥ paśyantvakasmādiha yamapuruṣāḥ kākagṛdhrāśca ghorā dhvāntaṃ
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.12_2: āyātāyāta śīghraṃ bhayamapanayata bhrātaro jīvitāḥ smaḥ
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.12_9: rdṛṣṭvāgre mañjughoṣaṃ bhavatu kalakalaḥ sāṃprataṃ nārakāṇām //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.18_0: saṃtarpyantāṃ pretāḥ snāpyantāṃ śītalā bhavantu sadā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.19_0: andhāḥ paśyantu rūpāṇi śṛṇvantu badhirāḥ sadā /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.23_0: sarvā diśaḥ śivāḥ santu sarveṣāṃ pathivartinām /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.30_0: yāḥ kāścana striyo loke puruṣatvaṃ vrajantu tāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.35_1: mṛdvī ca vaiḍūryamayī bhūmiḥ sarvatra tiṣṭhatu //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.39_1: sphīto bhavatu lokaśca rājā bhavatu dhārmikaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.40_0: śaktā bhavantu cauṣadhyo mantrāḥ sidhyantu jāpinām /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.41_0: mā kaścidduḥkhitaḥ sattvo mā pāpī mā ca rogitaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.41_1: mā hīnaḥ paribhūto vā mā bhūtkaścicca durmanāḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.53_0: yadā ca draṣṭukāmaḥ syāṃ praṣṭukāmaśca kiṃcana /
SA11bsa003_u:sbca_10.54_1: yathā carati mañjuśrīḥ saiva caryā bhavenmama //
